document.full_text: twitter co-founder jack dorsey, who returned this week to the company after a two-year absence, wants to make the microblogging site more approachable to the masses, he said on tuesday.
document.title: twitter co-founder wants more mainstream website
lines_and_colors: twitter co-founder jack dorsey, who returned this week to the company after a two-year absence, wants to make the microblogging site more approachable to the masses, he said on tuesday.
